about.title: Pole Studio
about.description: We are the first Pole Fitness studio specialized in teaching this sport in the city of Mérida, Yucatán. We have +12 years of experience and the best team of Nationally and Internationally certified instructors for your best preparation in the practice of this sport.
about.item1: Highly trained and experienced pole fitness instructors
about.item2: A wide variety of classes and levels for everyone interested in pole fitness
about.item3: A supportive environment and community to help you achieve your pole fitness goals
about.item4: First-class facilities with height for professional training

features.title: Our Lessons

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Common customer questions for the purpose of providing quick and easy information

item1.title: Do I need any kind of experience to start?
item1.description: No, in our lessons you will learn the basics to start in any discipline, it does not matter if you have never done physical activity.

item2.title: Is there an age limit?
item2.description: Our lessons are open to all ages, we work according to your abilities.

item3.title: Can I register for any lesson on the schedule?
item3.description: Our lessons are multilevel, you can join any class on the schedule except those mentioned as advanced.

item4.title: Where can I buy the grips allowed for the lessons?
item4.description: In the studio you will be able to find different brands and presentations of grips, gloves, anklets and knee pads for your practice.

item5.title: Is it mandatory to attend classes in uniform?
item5.description: No, however, we recommend attending with the appropriate clothing for your practice. In the studio you can find the official uniform.
